The company behind BOSH! has a reputation on being environmentally friendly but may not be as sustainable in their sourcing practices." - Emily M.
Awards: 4/5 stars
Categories:

Reviews:

* "I love that [BOTH]!" says one reviewer who found it to have too many vegetables."
- A fan favorite among vegans!
"Unfortunately I had trouble finding any meat options," said another consumer.

Some reviewers praised these products' natural ingredient list while other criticized them due environmental concerns about animal welfare."

In response we asked our vegetarian friend why they didn't like all plant-based protein sources available at your store... They told us there were no good alternatives when you're trying veganism!"
Here's what happened instead:"They just don’t offer enough tofu or tempeh..."

We appreciate feedback from vegetarians; however here’s an example where someone was disappointed because he couldn’t find anything suitable substitute within his budget...
"I tried those new soy based proteins thinking my money would go better towards buying organic milk..."

The BOSH! series is a collection of simple recipes that are perfect for [SUBCULTURE] and all plants. The book features 100+ pages with easy-to-follow instructions, beautiful photographs to inspire creativity in the kitchen."

* "The book is a [TYPE]. Customers praise its simplicity and creativity, but some find it too easy."
"Overall this cookbook has been very helpful for me. I've learned new recipes that are both delicious to eat on the go."
